block.p: EISENBERGER-Agnes. The Chamber Music Society of Lincoln Center notes with sadness the passing of Agnes Eisenberger whose uncompromising work promoting artistic excellence was felt throughout the classical music world for 40 years. We will miss you. David Shifrin Artistic Director Norma Hurlburt Executive Director
EISENBERGER - Agnes. Friend and colleague through the years. Agi, dear, sadly you left us too soon. ''Sag beim Abschied leise Servus!'' Ruth Carlin
